results.name: (Number of 1's in binary expansion of n) mod 3.
comment: This is the generalized Thue-Morse sequence t_3 (Allouche and Shallit, p. 335).
Ternary sequence which is a fixed point of the morphism 0 -> 01, 1 -> 12, 2 -> 20.

Sequence is T^(infty)(0) where T is the operator acting on any word on alphabet {0,1,2} by inserting 1 after 0, 2 after 1 and 0 after 2. For instance T(001)=010112, T(120)=122001. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Mar 02 2009
reference: J.-P. Allouche and J. Shallit, Automatic Sequences, Cambridge Univ. Press, 2003.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Jin Chen, Zhixiong Wen, Wen Wu, On the additive complexity of a Thue-Morse like sequence, arXiv:1802.03610 [math.CO], 2018.
